name: UITabBarController
desc: A container view controller that manages a multiselection interface, where the selection determines which child view controller to display.

items.name: var delegate: UITabBarControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The tab bar controllerâ€™s delegate object.

items.name: protocol UITabBarControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods you implement to customize the behavior of a tab bar.

items.name: var tabBar: UITabBar
items.desc: The tab bar view associated with this controller.

items.name: var viewControllers: [UIViewController]?
items.desc: An array of the root view controllers displayed by the tab bar interface.

items.name: func setViewControllers([UIViewController]?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the root view controllers of the tab bar controller.

items.name: var customizableViewControllers: [UIViewController]?
items.desc: The subset of view controllers managed by this tab bar controller that can be customized.

items.name: var moreNavigationController: UINavigationController
items.desc: The view controller that manages the More navigation interface.

items.name: var selectedViewController: UIViewController?
items.desc: The view controller associated with the currently selected tab item.

items.name: var selectedIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the view controller associated with the currently selected tab item.
